projects.name: WebcamWinForm
projects.description: A simple Windows Forms application to demonstrate how to record video and audio via a webcam using C#.

projects.name: Lunar.OCR
projects.description: A project to show how we can perform Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on UWP app.

projects.name: WordpressRssFeed
projects.description: This is a NuGet library to retrieve the basic information of posts in a given Wordpress blog.

projects.name: GCL Boilerplate for C#
projects.description: This is a project that aims to assist me to come up with solutions quickly in certain use cases, such as creating a console application to parse a CSV file, etc.
